name: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Polo
description:
DESCRIPTION

Benefits:

Nike Dri-FIT technology moves sweat away from your skin for quicker evaporation, helping you stay dry and comfortable.
Embroidered logo at the chest.

Fold-over collar
2-button placket
Material: 100% polyester
Machine wash
Style # DH0858-100; DH0858-811
Available Colours: White/Black; Rust Factor/White; Black/White
